LanguageData.AYCandle.label: Candle
LanguageData.AYCandle.description: A tallow candle for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with tallow. Produces a small amount of heat.
LanguageData.AYCandle_Blueprint.label: Candle (blueprint)
LanguageData.AYCandle_Blueprint_Install.label: Candle (blueprint)
LanguageData.AYCandle_Frame.label: Candle (building)
LanguageData.AYCandle_Frame.description: A tallow candle for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with tallow. Produces a small amount of heat.
